channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 7th January
item.description:
Cars parking on grass verge random areas damaged grass verge i have raised jobs for new top soil on several occasions but has been driven on and now destroyed again can this be looked at please again as to how we can stop this
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of dog poo back on pavements on way up to school, 7th January
item.description:
There is a lot of dog poo on dinglewell up to school, its constant on this road because people come off the field with their dogs and dont pick up after themselves, its such a shame and makes the school run twice a day unpleasant, i end up walking in the road to avoid it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
100metres approx Uphill from Andoversford school toward the Kilkenny
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are two sets of temp traffic lights by golden vale and the coop on Parton Road. They are causing chaos, 6th January
item.description:
The lights are out of synch. No one can get through itâ€™s causing major traffic flow issues. Someone is going to get hurt or there is going to be an accident. The sequencing is out. And they were stuck in red for ages
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 6th January
item.description:
Customer reporting that the two sets of temp lights are close enough that the traffic flowing through them gets gridlocked by traffic coming from the opposite directions - no manual control
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
